General.Name: Quaint Oak Bancorp Inc
General.Description: Quaint Oak Bancorp, Inc. operates as the holding company for Quaint Oak Bank that provides banking services in Pennsylvania. It offers various deposit products, including money market accounts, certificates of deposit, non-interest-bearing checking accounts for businesses and consumers, and savings accounts. The company also provides residential and commercial mortgage loans, construction loans, commercial business loans, home equity loans, and lines of credit; and mortgage banking, real estate sales, title abstract, and insurance services. It serves its customers through correspondence, telephone, and online banking. The company was founded in 1926 and is headquartered in Southampton, Pennsylvania.
General.Address: 501 Knowles Avenue, Southampton, PA, United States, 18966
